paper_abstract: A major challenge in landscape and environmental modelling is to effectively visualize large amounts of time-series simulation output, often in various Geographic Information System (GIS) formats. We developed a software tool (LANDISVIEW), to easily visualize and animate time-series of ERDAS *.gis maps. The open source tool can also be used to generate batch files for FRAGSTATS, a widely used spatial analysis program. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: LANDISVIEW: A visualization tool for landscape modelling
